import React from 'react' function Main(){ const avatarButton = document.querySelector('.profile__avatar-area-button') const profilePopup = document.querySelector('.popup_type_profile') const cardPopup = document.querySelector('.popup_type_create-card') const avatarPopup = document.querySelector('.popup_type_profile-aavtar') function handleEditAvatarClick(){ avatarPopup.classList.add('popup_active') } function handleEditProfileClick(){ profilePopup.classList.add('popup_active') } function handleAppPlaceClick(){ cardPopup.classList.add('popup_active') } avatarButton.addEventListener('click', handleEditAvatarClick) return (
